DOC.brief_title: Low Dose Radiotherapy Advanced Hidradenitis Suppurativa
DOC.detailed_description: This phase I clinical trial use Simon-two stage design establish safety radiotherapy treatment advance hidradenitis suppurativa ( HS ) . In first six month , 6 patient enrol , patient study meet termination criterion , study extend second stage . A maximum 20 patient enrol . Patients treat skin-directed radiotherapy , use total prescription dose 7.5 Gy five fraction 1.5 Gy one week . Patients see HS specialty clinic Montefiore Medial Center least three month . Quality life change , immunohistochemical change , cutaneous discharge also evaluate study period .
